description: Simple ADX and SMA crossover strategy using trend strength confirmation with short and long moving averages. Uses Freqtrade v3 interface.
author: Gert Wohlgemuth

populate_indicators.description: Calculate ADX for trend strength and short/long SMAs for crossover signals
populate_indicators.pseudocode:
1. Calculate ADX with period 14
2. Calculate short SMA with period 3
3. Calculate long SMA with period 6

input_params.name: dataframe
input_params.example: pandas DataFrame with columns: open, high, low, close, volume

populate_indicators.output_description: DataFrame with indicators: adx, short (SMA3), long (SMA6)
populate_indicators.logic_explanation: Simple setup using ADX to measure trend strength and fast/slow SMAs for entry/exit timing.

populate_entry_trend.description: Generate long entry signals when short SMA crosses above long SMA with strong trend
populate_entry_trend.pseudocode:
1. Check ADX > 25 (strong trend required)
2. Check short SMA crosses above long SMA
3. If both conditions true, set enter_long = 1

input_params.name: dataframe
input_params.example: DataFrame with ADX and SMA indicators

populate_entry_trend.output_description: DataFrame with enter_long column indicating entry signals (1 = enter, 0 = no action)
populate_entry_trend.logic_explanation: Enters long positions when fast SMA crosses above slow SMA, but only in strong trending markets (ADX > 25).

populate_exit_trend.description: Generate long exit signals when trend weakens and long SMA crosses above short SMA
populate_exit_trend.pseudocode:
1. Check ADX < 25 (weak trend)
2. Check long SMA crosses above short SMA
3. If both conditions true, set exit_long = 1

input_params.name: dataframe
input_params.example: DataFrame with ADX and SMA indicators

populate_exit_trend.output_description: DataFrame with exit_long column indicating exit signals (1 = exit, 0 = no action)
populate_exit_trend.logic_explanation: Exits positions when trend strength weakens and the SMA crossover reverses, indicating potential trend change.

populate_buy_trend.output_description: Not implemented - uses new entry/exit interface
populate_buy_trend.logic_explanation: Strategy uses the newer Freqtrade v3 interface with entry/exit trend methods.

indicators.name: SMA Long

sell_conditions.logic: ADX < 25 AND long_SMA crosses above short_SMA
